metadata.title: CVE-2019-20633 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - negligible
metadata.description: GNU patch through 2.7.6 contains a free(p_line[p_end]) Double Freevulnerability in the function another_hunk in pch.c that can cause a denialof service via a crafted patch file. NOTE: this issue exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2018-6952.

criterions.comment: patch package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
